official.headline: Public Gatherings Rise
official.anchor_line: Citizens gather peacefully in the city center as new digital archives are released.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd demonstrates model civic order and engagement under the guidance of resilient oversight.

official.headline: Archive Release
official.anchor_line: Previously withheld council documents are made publicly available for review.
official.contextual_reframing: This milestone reaffirms the administration's ongoing commitment to transparency and informed governance.

official.headline: Governance Transitions
official.anchor_line: Citizen assemblies conclude council oversight, signaling civic renewal for Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: A new, participatory era is welcomed, upholding the city’s legacy of adaptive, rational leadership in changing times.

underground.headline: Council Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Halden’s secret files leak — Council crimes no longer hidden.
underground.contextual_reframing: Residents see the truth behind BCI: rigged scores, vanished neighbors, and lives tweaked by machines. No more clean hands at the top.

underground.headline: Hidden Stories Emerge
underground.anchor_line: Whistleblowers confess to deleting enemies at Council’s command.
underground.contextual_reframing: Ordinary workers speak up. Ghosted citizens, erased records. Proof the system served itself, not us — until brave voices forced the truth into daylight.

underground.headline: People Take Control
underground.anchor_line: Citizens flood the streets, courts go public, and the Council finally falls.
underground.contextual_reframing: Against screens and orders, we built justice in the open. The experiment broke. Real voices won. Stenograd belongs to its people again.
